tweet: "Acknowledge fear, embrace it and move on.  See it for the teacher that it is."  DraytonBoylston
"I am convinced that life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it." - Charles Swindall - so very true.
Reading "A Complaint Free World." Over 6 million people worldwide have decided to stop complaining.  Very powerful and worthwhile movement.
As ironic as it may sound, we're far more inspiring to others when we're willing to listen than when we're giving advice. ~ Dr.Wayne Dyer
Mothers are true champions.  Took care of my two kids (6 years and 5 months) for 5 days solo and I'm ready to collapse.   How do they do it?
